English: P.K
Filipino: P.K

English: Hunting Monsters to recover Karma
Filipino: Mangaso ng Halimaw para makarecover ng Karma

English: Your Karma can be redeemed. Are you ready to pay for your sins?
Filipino: Ang iyong karma ay pwedeng maligtas. Handa kanaba bayaran ang iyong mga kasalanan?

English: Hunt $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.
Filipino: Manghuli ng $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.

English: You have yet to pay for your sins…
Filipino: Di mo pa bayad ang iyong mga kasalanan…

English: Your quest has been accomplished. Your sins have been forgiven.
Filipino: Ang iyong quest ay natapos na. Ang iyong mga kasalanan ay napatawad na.

English: If you are truly unwilling to fight for forgiveness, then there is no hope for you.
Filipino: Kung ikaw ay ayaw mo lumaban para sa kapatawaran, wala nang pag asa para sa iyo.

English: Hunting $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ will recover your Karma points.
Filipino: Ang Pang-huhuli ng $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ ay makakapagpanumbalik ng iyong Karma points.

English: Get the Key to escape Kebaras Island
Filipino: Kunin ang susi para makatakas sa Kebaras Island

English: You can warp away from here at the Warp Zone but you need the Key. Are you ready to earn it?
Filipino: Makakawarp ka paalis dito sa Warp Zone ngunit kailangan mo ng susi. Handa kaba pagtrabahuhan ito?

English: I will give you the Key if you can bring me $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ Beads of Sin. You can get the beads in the empty lot beside the campsite.
Filipino: Handa kitang bigyan ng susi basta dalahan mo ako ng $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ Beads of Sin. Makakakuha ka ng beads sa isang bakanteng lote tabi ng campsite.

English: How long until you are ready to leave this place?
Filipino: Gano pa katagal bago ikaw ay maging handa para umalis sa lugar na ito?

English: Here is the Key. Now go and never return.
Filipino: Eto ang susi. Ngayon umalis kana at wag kana bumalik.

English: I will give you your freedom for only $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ beads. How could you pass on an offer like that?
Filipino: Bibigyan kita ng kalayaan para sa $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ beads. Pano mo hindi tatanggapin ang usapan na yan?

English: Keep gathering your beads.
Filipino: Ituloy ang pag iipon ng iyong bulitas.

English: You are welcome to stay for as long as you would like.
Filipino: Pwede ka manatili kahit gano pa katagal ang gusto mo.

English: Entering the Dekane Mine
Filipino: Pumapasok ng Dekane Mine

English: You are really willing to enter the Dekane Mine?
Filipino: Handa kaba pumasok ng Dekane Mine?

English: Then visit the Dwarpet, Rankashu, in front of the Dekane Mine.
Filipino: Tapos bisitahin ang Dwarpet, Rankashu, sa harap ng Dekane Mine.

English: Ha ha ha. Of course not. It is far too frightening.
Filipino: Ha ha ha. Siyempre naman hindi. Masyado itong nakakatakot.

English: Here is the Mine Entrance Card. It is up to you to enter but I advise against it. You may die.
Filipino: Eto ang Mine Entrance Card. Nasasaiyo na ang desisyon kung papasok ka pero kontra ako dito. Pwede kang mamatay.

English: Is it so hard to tell me what I want to know? Leave quickly.
Filipino: Masyado ba mahirap sabihin sakin ang gusto ko malaman? Lumayas ka.

English: Visit the Dwarpet Rankashu and get the information Cell wanted.
Filipino: Bisitahin ang Dwarpet Rankashu at kunin ang information Cell na kailangan.

English: You have the Mine Entrance Card. Now to find out what everyone is so afraid of.
Filipino: Mayroon kang Mine Entrace Card. Ngayon hanapin mo kung ano ang rason bat natatakot ang lahat.

English: Keakoon in Mine (1)
Filipino: Keakoon in Mine (1)

English: I am Drian son of Nevil, great chief of the original Keakoon. We were once friendly with the humans.
Filipino: Ako si Drian anak ni Nevil, kapitan ng orihinal na Keakoon. Kami ay palakaibigan dati sa mga tao.

English: We helped humans develop the mine long ago but when they left some of us were locked up by a new breed of Keakoons.
Filipino: Tinulungan namin ang mga tao na itayo ang minahan noong unang panahon, ngunit noong sila ay lumisan, kami ay kinulong ng bagong lahi ng Keakoons.

English: My father is old and cannot last much longer in his prison. Please help me rescue him.
Filipino: Ang tatay ko ay matanda na at di na magtatagal sa kanyang kulungan. Tulungan mo ako iligtas siya.

English: The key to the cell where my father is being kept has three pieces. These false Keakoons are inside, keeping them hidden. Go and bring them to me.
Filipino: Ang susi sa kulungan kung saan nakakulong ang tatay ko ay mayroong tatlong piraso. Ang mga pekeng Keakoons ay nasa loob, tinatago ito. Dalihin mo ito sa akin.

English: How could you? To think I thought to count you as a friend.
Filipino: How could you? To think I thought to count you as a friend.

English: Oh… Thank you… so much. I could never repay you fully. Thank you so much.
Filipino: Oh… Thank you… so much. I could never repay you fully. Thank you so much.

English: You have to gather all three pieces of the Key.
Filipino: Kailangan mo kunin ang lahat ng tatlong piraso ng susi.

English: Hunt Keakoon and get all 3 pieces of the prison key.
Filipino: Pumatay ng Keakoon at kunin ang tatlong piraso ng susi ng kulungan.

English: You have delivered all the pieces of the key but it looks like he still has something to say.
Filipino: Naibigay mo lahat ng tatlong piraso ng susi, ngunit mukhang may sasabihin pa siya.

English: Keakoon in Mine (2)
Filipino: Keakoon in Mine (2)

English: I still have a need for you. Would you help me yet again?
Filipino: Kailangan pa kita. Pwede mo ba ako matulungan ulit?

English: You are a true friend. Take this key and free my father. I am not strong enough. Please.
Filipino: Ikaw ay isang tunay na kaibigan. Kunin mo ang susi na ito at palayain mo ang aking tatay. Mahina lang ako. Pakiusap.

English: You show yourself to be no better than the fiends that imprisoned my father.
Filipino: Pinapakita mo ang sarili mo na mas malala ka pa sa mga halimaw na nagkulong sa aking tatay.

English: My father is in a prison on the outskirts of Keakoon village. Please hurry he cannot last much longer.
Filipino: Ang tatay ko ay nakakulong sa labas ng Keakoon village. Pakiusap bilisan mo di na siya magtatagal.

English: Rescue Nevil, father of Drian.
Filipino: Iligtas si Nevil, tatay ni Drian.

English: You have saved Nevil. Go and talk to him.
Filipino: Nailigtas mo si Nevil. Kausapin mo siya.

English: Keakoon in Mine (3)
Filipino: Keakoon in Mine (3)

English: Many thanks, friend. You have done so much for us but would you do something more?
Filipino: Maraming salamat, kaibigan. Marami kang nagawa para sa amin, ngunit pwede ba na may magawa kapa?

English: Please defeat the Elite Keakoon Guard Leader and bring me the Chief Sign that proves I am the one true Chief of the Keakoon. Would you also please bring me the cargo my son Drian is keeping safe for me?
Filipino: Pakiusap talunin mo ang Elite Keakoon Guard Leader at dalihin mo ang Chief Sign na nagpapatunay na ako ang tunay na Kapitan ng mga Keakoon. At pwede rin ba madala mo sa akin ang bagay na tinatago ng aking anak na si Drian para sa akin?

English: What kind of person are you if you refuse to help those with less power than you?
Filipino: Anong klaseng tao ka na ayaw tumulong sa mga mas mahina sa iyo?

English: Thank you. It is my great hope that Keakoon and human can thrive together once again. Take this ring as a gift.
Filipino: Salamat. Ito ay isang pag asa na ang Keakoon at sangkatauhan ay mamumuhay ng matiwasay ulit. Kunin mo ang singsing na ito bilang regalo.

English: If, by any chance, you want more adventure visit Bernard in Darken. Be careful. I would hate for something to happen to you.
Filipino: Kung, sakali man, gusto mo ng paglalakbay bisitahin mo si Bernard sa Darken. Mag-iingat ka. Ayaw ko may mangyari sa iyo.

English: Hrmm… It might not be that dangerous for someone as strong as you.
Filipino: Hrmm... Di naman siguro ito ganito kadelikado para sa taong kasinglakas mo.

English: Bring the seal of the chief and the package that Drian is holding back to Nevil.
Filipino: Dalhin ang seal of the chief at ang packagee na tinatago ni Drian kay Nevil.

English: You rescued Nevil, chief of the Keakoon. You can feel the secrets around this place. Maybe you can get some information from Bernard.
Filipino: Niligtas mo si Nevil, kapitan ng Keakoon. Nararamdaman mo ang mga lihim sa lugar na ito. Baka makakuha ka ng impormasyon kay Bernard.

English: Death Mine and Roaches (1)
Filipino: Death Mine and Roaches (1)

English: Hmm… Is that the ring of Nevil around your finger?
Filipino: Hmm... Yan ba ang singsing ni Nevil sa iyong daliri?

English: Your strength has been proven then. Would you prove yourself further? The Roach is somehow connected to the death of people in the mine.
Filipino: Napatunayan mo na malakas ka. Kaya mo ba patunayan pa lalo ang sarili mo? Ang Roach ay konektado sa pagkamatay ng mga tao sa minahan.

English: There is a mystery to be unlocked here. Would you bring me the blood of the Roach larva?
Filipino: Mayroong kababalaghan na makikita dito. Pwede ba dalihin mo sakin ang dugo ng Roach larva?

English: Thank you. There are two kinds of Roach - Pink and Blue. Break open their eggs and hunt down the larva.
Filipino: Thank you. There are two kinds of Roach - Pink and Blue. Break open their eggs and hunt down the larva.

English: There will be no revelation without danger.
Filipino: Walang mailalabas kung walang panganib.

English: Ahh, there is much to be learned from the blood of these Roaches.
Filipino: Ahh, mayroong maraming pwede matutunan sa dugo ng mga ipis na ito.

English: No! No! No! Bring me more information!
Filipino: Wag! Wag! Wag! Bigyan mo pa ako ng mas maraming impormasyon!

English: Bring the blood of Roaches by destroying their eggs and defeating Roach Larva.
Filipino: Bring the blood of Roaches by destroying their eggs and defeating Roach Larva.

English: Looks like he still has a need of you.
Filipino: Mukhang mayroon pa siyang pangangailangan sa iyo.

English: Death Mine and Roaches (2)
Filipino: Death Mine and Roaches (2)

English: The toxicity of Roaches has poisoned many humans in the mine.
Filipino: Ang lason sa mga ipis ang naglason ng maraming tao sa minahan na ito.

English: It seems that the Roach Queens are the source of the poison.
Filipino: Mukhang ang Reyna ng mga ipis ang pinagmumulan ng lason.

English: Bring me the blood of Pink and Blue Roach Queens so that I can make a vaccine.
Filipino: Bring me the blood of Pink and Blue Roach Queens so that I can make a vaccine.

English: Sprinkle this liquid on the Roach Queen egg to wake her up. Be careful.
Filipino: Ikalat ang liquid na ito sa itlog ng Reyna ng mga ipis para gisingin siya. Mag iingat ka.

English: You really will not see this through to the end?
Filipino: Ayaw mo makita ito hanggang sa pagtatapos?

English: This vaccine will save many lives. Thank you.
Filipino: Ang bakuna na ito ay magliligtas ng maraming buhay. Salamat.

English: Take this weapon as a token of gratitude and this card to venture deeper into the mine.
Filipino: Take this weapon as a token of gratitude and this card to venture deeper into the mine.

English: The Roaches appeared very suddenly in the mine. Maybe you can find out the reason by going deeper into the mine.
Filipino: Ang Roaches ay biglaang nagpakita sa minahan. Baka makita mo ang rason bakit sa kailaliman nito.

English: I am sure that you can handle the upcoming danger.
Filipino: Sigurado ako na kaya mo ang nagbabadyang panganib.

English: Gather the blood of Pinky and Blue Roach Queen.
Filipino: Kunin ang dugo ng Pinky at Blue Roach Queen.

English: Something about the way Bernard talks suggessts that the Roaches were placed in the mines intentionally. Maybe you can find out.
Filipino: Mayroong rason sa pangungusap ni Bernard na nagsasabing ang mga Roaches ay inilagay sa minahan ng pasadya. Baka mahanap mo ito.

English: Dwarpet Kazen
Filipino: Dwarpet Kazen

English: What brings you here? I am sure you know of the many deaths surrounding this place.
Filipino: Ano ang kailangan mo dito? Sigurado ako alam mo na maraming namatay sa lugar na ito.

English: You will not be able to find out what happened here without my help. I will tell you what you want to know if you do me a favor. What do you think?
Filipino: Di mo makikita kung ano nangyari dito kung di kita tutulungan. Sasabihin ko sayo kung ano gusto mo malaman if gagawan mo ako ng pabor. Ano sa tingin mo?

English: Bring me 30 Cillin and I will tell you everything you need to know.
Filipino: Bigyan mo ako ng 30 Cillin at sasabihin ko sayo lahat ng gusto mo malaman.

English: Pssh, some great hero, you cannot even bring me some simple stones.
Filipino: Pssh, isang magaling na bayani, pero di mo mabigay sakin ang simpleng bato.

English: Hmm… I did not think you would be back so soon. Take this money as a gift.
Filipino: Hmm… I did not think you would be back so soon. Take this money as a gift.

English: I said 30. Not 29 or 28. Bring me 30 Cillin.
Filipino: Sabi ko 30. Hindi 29 o 28. Bigyan mo ako ng 30 Cillin.

English: Gather 30 Cillin.
Filipino: Mangolekta ng 30 Cillin.

English: Bring Ribenuum
Filipino: Bring Ribenuum

English: I am here in Dekane mining for Ribenuum. In all of Madrigal Ribenuum can only be found in the Darkon area.
Filipino: Andito ako sa Dekane para magmina ng Ribenuum. Sa lahat ng Madrigal ang Ribenuum ay mahahanap lamang sa Darkon.

English: Ribenuum is made when a Green Trillipy eats a stone and metabolizes it.
Filipino: Ang Ribenuum ay nagagawa pag ang isang Green Trillipy ay lumunok ng isang bato at pinababa ito.

English: Would you bring me some Ribenuum? A Green Tillipy is dangerous but you look equally as dangerous.
Filipino: Pwede mo ba ako dalahan ng Ribenuum? Ang isang Green Trillipy ay mapanganib ngunit ikaw ay kasing panganib neto.

English: Green Trillipy are down the hall to the right. The room to the left is blocked.
Filipino: Green Trillipy are down the hall to the right. The room to the left is blocked.

English: Are you kidding me? Go on and get out of here, I may not look it but I am an old Dwarpet and I do not have time for games.
Filipino: Niloloko mo ba ako? Lumayas ka dito, di mo lang namumukhaan, pero ako ay isang matandang Dwarpet at wala akong oras makipaglaro.

English: Ahhh...you brought the Ribenuum. But what is this? It is flawed!
Filipino: Ahhh...nagdala ka ng Ribenuum. Pero ano to? Me sira!

English: How hard is it to bring me what I asked for? 30 pieces of Ribenuum?
Filipino: Gano kahirap ba na dalihin mo ang sinasabi ko? 30 piraso ng Ribenuum?

English: Gather 30 pieces of Ribenuum from Green Trillipy
Filipino: Gather 30 pieces of Ribenuum from Green Trillipy

English: Refine Ribenuum
Filipino: Refine Ribenuum

English: The Ribenuum you brought is impure. I could take it home and refine it myself but the other Dwarpets would laugh me back to Flarine.
Filipino: Ang Ribenuum na dinala mo ay di puro. Pwede ko ito iuwi at irefine ito ng ako lang ngunit ang ibang Dwarpets ay pagtatawanan ako pauwi ng Flarine.

English: It will have to be refined in a human village then. There is only one human I trust to do it it right. There is man named Nein, he was one of the last humans to work in these mines. Maybe the very last human.
Filipino: Kailangan ito mairefine sa isang bayan ng mga tao. Mayroon lamang isang tao Nagtitiwala ako sayo na gagawin mo ito ng tama. Mayroong tao na nagngangalang Nein, siya ang isa sa huling tao na nagtrabaho sa minahan na ito. Baka pinakahuling tao.

English: Bring these Ribenuum to Nein and have him refine them. Then bring them back to me, would you?
Filipino: Dalihin mo itong Ribenuum kay Nein at siya ang magrerefine nito. Tapos dalihin mo ito pabalik sakin , pakiusap?

English: I heard that Nein lives somewhere in the Dead Walderness. He will refine the 30 pieces of impure Ribenuum into 10 pieces of high quality Ribenuum.
Filipino: Nadinig ko nakatira si Nein sa Dead Walderness. Irerefine niya ang 30 pirasong impure Ribenuum at gagawin itong 10 piraso ng high quality Ribenuum.

English: Are you kidding me? Get lost! I do not have patience for games!
Filipino: Niloloko mo ba ako? Lumayas ka! Wala akong pasensya para makipaglaro!

English: Oh… Thank you, thank you, thank you! Take this necklace and some money with you.
Filipino: Oh… Thank you, thank you, thank you! Take this necklace and some money with you.

English: Hmmm... maybe I was asking too much of you. You can just go home.
Filipino: Hmmm... maybe I was asking too much of you. You can just go home.

English: Gather 10 pieces of high quality Ribenuum
Filipino: Kumuha ng 10 pirasong high quality Ribenuum

English: Bring Triduum
Filipino: Magdala ng Triduum

English: Ribenuum is useless to most humans. Maybe you have a Dwarpet friend you can give it to? Here, let me see it. These samples are too impure and even I cannot refine them without the right materials.
Filipino: Ang Ribenuum ay walang kwenta sa karamihan ng tao. Baka mayroon kang kaibigang dwarpet na pagbibigyan neto? Dito, tingnan ko nga yan. Ang mga ito ay masyadong marumi na kahit ako Ay di kayang linisin ito ng walang tamang kagamitan.

English: I need a special metal called Triduum in order to refine this. You can get it by hunting Violet Trillipy but they live deep in the Dekane Mine.
Filipino: Kailangan ko ng kakaibang bakal na ang tawag ay Triduum para malinis ito. Makukuha mo ito sa mga Violet Trillipy, ngunit nakatira sila sa kailaliman ng Dekane Mine.

English: Well… If you really need the Ribenuum refined bring me 20 Triduums. You are going to need a special ID card to go in there.
Filipino: Well… If you really need the Ribenuum refined bring me 20 Triduums. You are going to need a special ID card to go in there.

English: Go and get an ID card from the guys I used to work with.
Filipino: Kuhanin ang ID card sa mga kasamahan ko sa trabaho dati.

English: Ha ha ha.You can do that if you need to. I hope you are not doing this for some Dwarpet.
Filipino: Ha ha ha.Gawin mo yan kung kailangan mo. Sana ay hindi mo ginagawa ito para lang sa isang Dwarpet.

English: Here is your refined Ribenuum. But, a word of warning, if the Dwarpet Kazen asked you for this… he is thinking more than he is saying.
Filipino: Narito ang pinong Ribenuum mo. Ngunit mag-ingat ka — kung hiniling ito sa'yo ng Dwarpet na si Kazen… mas marami siyang iniisip kaysa sa sinasabi niya.\n

English: Kazen has hated humans for as long as I have known him and him working with you means he is on to something big. You know… there is a rumor that he had a hand in all the deaths in that mine.
Filipino: Matagal nang galit si Kazen sa mga tao simula nang makilala ko siya, at kapag nakikipag-trabaho siya sa'yo ibig sabihin may malaki siyang napag-alaman. Alam mo… may sabi-sabi na may kinalaman siya sa lahat ng pagkamatay sa minahan na iyon.\n

English: You let me know if he is acting suspiciously. Maybe I can do something to help you.
Filipino: Sabihin mo sa'kin kung may kahina-hinala siyang ginagawa. Baka may magagawa ako para tumulong.\n

English: Why not just let it go? Go home and get some rest.
Filipino: Bakit hindi mo na lang palampasin? Umuwi ka na at magpahinga.\n

English: Get the ID card that will allow you into the room with the Violet Trillipy. Hunt them down and bring 20 pieces of Triduum to Nein.
Filipino: Kunin mo ang ID card na papapasok sa'yo sa kuwartong may Violet Trillipy. Hulihin ang mga iyon at magbalik ng 20 piraso ng Triduum kay Nein.\n

English: ID Card (1)
Filipino: ID Card (1)\n

English: What? You want to know where the Violet Trillipy live? You seem so curious about this accursed mine. Unfortunately, there are not many people left who know much about it.
Filipino: Ano? Gusto mong malaman kung saan nakatira ang Violet Trillipy? Ang laki ng pagkamausisa mo tungkol sa sumpang minahang ito. Sa kasamaang-palad, kakaunti na lang ang nakakaalam nito.\n

English: Only a few of the mine workers go that deep into the mine. I don't know much about them or the ID card they use to get down there. Oh! You should go speak with Bernard about this.
Filipino: Iilan lang sa mga minero ang pumapasok nang ganoon kalalim sa minahan. Wala akong masyadong alam tungkol sa kanila o sa ID card na ginagamit nila para makababa doon. Ah! Kausapin mo si Bernard tungkol dito.\n

English: Would you please say Hi to Bernard for me?
Filipino: Pwede mo bang sabihin hi kay Bernard para sa akin?\n

English: No, you are right. You should not be the next one to suffer.
Filipino: Tama ka, hindi dapat ikaw na ang masunod na magdusa.\n

English: Violet Trillipy… Do you mean you are going in there with them?
Filipino: Violet Trillipy… Ibig mong sabihin sasama ka sa kanila papunta roon?\n

English: Why not just relax and give it up?
Filipino: Bakit hindi ka na lang mag-relax at talikuran na?\n

English: Chat with Bernard, then meet Andre in Darkon 3.
Filipino: Kausapin mo muna si Bernard, pagkatapos magkita kayo ni Andre sa Darkon 3.\n

English: ID card (2)
Filipino: ID card (2)\n

English: Look, I have no problem giving you the ID card… I just do not want to see you die… But if you really insist, then fine. Hunt some Watangka and I will give you the card.
Filipino: Tingnan mo, wala akong problema ibigay sa'yo ang ID card… ayokong makita kang mamatay… Pero kung talagang pipilitin mo, sige. Papatayin mo muna ang ilang Watangka at ibibigay ko sa'yo ang card.\n

English: If you can hunt Watangka you can probably hunt Violet Trillipy.
Filipino: Kung kaya mong manghuli ng Watangka, malamang kakayanin mo ring hulihin ang Violet Trillipy.\n

English: Bye bye then! Take care of yourself…
Filipino: Sige, paalam! Ingat ka…\n

English: Hmm… Violet Trillipy may be stronger than Watangka.
Filipino: Hmmm… Maaaring mas malakas ang Violet Trillipy kaysa Watangka.\n

English: Alright, here is the ID card. Just make sure you come out of there alive. I do not need a guilty conscience.
Filipino: Sige, heto ang ID card. Siguraduhin mo lang na makalabas ka roon nang buhay. Ayokong may mabagabag na konsensya.\n

English: I guess we all get tired sometime?
Filipino: Siguro napapagod din tayong lahat paminsan-minsan?\n

English: Defeat 30 Captain Watangka and the Lord Watangka.
Filipino: Talunin ang 30 Captain Watangka at ang Lord Watangka.\n

English: Door of Dark
Filipino: Pinto ng Kadiliman\n

English: Excuse me. If you are not busy, would you please listen to my story? Have you ever heard of the Iblis Temple?
Filipino: Patawad. Kung hindi ka abala, puwede mo bang pakinggan ang kwento ko? Narinig mo na ba ang tungkol sa Iblis Temple?\n

English: The Iblis Temple was built by the followers of Iblis, a leader from before the first age of Madrigal.
Filipino: Itinayo ang Iblis Temple ng mga tagasunod ni Iblis, isang lider mula bago ang unang panahon ng Madrigal.\n

English: The temple is located in the Fantasy Desert, in the southern part of Saint Morning.
Filipino: Matatagpuan ang templo sa Fantasy Desert, sa timog na bahagi ng Saint Morning.\n

English: You see... every mayor has to explore all the Islands of Madrigal. In the course of these travels we have to visit the Iblis Temple but... I am so afraid.
Filipino: Alam mo… kailangang galugarin ng bawat mayor ang lahat ng mga Isla ng Madrigal. Sa mga paglalakbay na ito kailangan naming bisitahin ang Iblis Temple pero… natatakot talaga ako.\n

English: Would you please help me? I beg of you.
Filipino: Puwede mo ba akong tulungan? Ipinagdarasal ko sa'yo.\n

English: Thank you! Please, investigate the entrance of the temple for anything dangerous. Would you?
Filipino: Salamat! Paki-imbestiga ang pasukan ng templo kung may anumang delikado. Pwede ba?\n

English: I cannot force you to help me if you are busy. But maybe, when you have the time, you could come back and help me.
Filipino: Hindi kita mapipilitang tumulong kung abala ka. Pero baka kapag may oras ka, puwede ka pang bumalik at tumulong sa'kin.\n

English: Thank you, you did a great job.
Filipino: Salamat, mahusay ang ginawa mo.\n

English: It is very easy to find the entrance of the temple in Fantasy Desert.
Filipino: Madali lang hanapin ang pasukan ng templo sa Fantasy Desert.\n

English: Investigate the temple entrace.
Filipino: Imbestigahan ang pasukan ng templo.\n

English: Temple of the Clown
Filipino: Templo ng Payaso\n

English: Oh... Back so soon? I am glad you are back but I am still so worried.
Filipino: Ah... Bumalik ka na agad? Natutuwa akong bumalik ka pero nag-aalala pa rin ako.\n

English: I guess I am still worrying about the Iblis Temple. I know you said that there is nothing to worry about but I still have a bad feeling about that place.
Filipino: Siguro patuloy akong nag-aalala tungkol sa Iblis Temple. Alam kong sinabi mong walang dapat ikabahala pero may masamang kutob pa rin ako tungkol sa lugar na iyon.\n

English: Would you please help me once more? I will not be able to rest until I know for sure…
Filipino: Puwede mo ba akong tulungan muli? Hindi ako makakapagpahinga hangga't hindi ako sigurado…\n

English: I heard that there is a copy of the Iblis Revelation in the temple. Please bring me a rubbed copy of it, I need to see what it says.
Filipino: Narinig kong may kopya ng Iblis Revelation sa templo. Pakidala sa'kin ang isang kiniskisang kopya nito, kailangan kong makita kung ano ang sinasabi nito.\n

English: ...but I... I... need your help…
Filipino: ...ngunit ako... ako... kailangan ko ang tulong mo...\n

English: This… this is more shocking than I could have imagined. Bubble please protect us.
Filipino: Ito… ito ay mas nakakagulat kaysa inisip ko. Bubble, protektahan mo kami.\n

English: There is a copy of the Iblis Revelation in the Iblis Temple. Bring a rubbed copy of it.
Filipino: May kopya ng Iblis Revelation sa Iblis Temple. Dalhin mo ang kiniskis na kopya nito.\n

English: The Revival
Filipino: Ang Pagbabangon\n

English: What should we do?! What should we do?!
Filipino: Ano ang gagawin natin?! Ano ang gagawin natin?!\n

English: I read the revelation and it speaks of the revival of Iblis as the trigger to the end of the world!
Filipino: Binasa ko ang revelation at sinasabi nito na ang pagbabangon ni Iblis ang magiging mitsa ng katapusan ng mundo!\n

English: If this is true, we have to stop it! This could be worse than the Hero Wars of long ago.
Filipino: Kung totoo ito, kailangan natin pigilan! Maaaring mas masahol pa ito kaysa sa Hero Wars noon.\n

English: You told me that you saw new types of masquerpets while you were getting the revelation right? I think that maybe…
Filipino: Sinabi mo sa'kin na may nakita kang bagong uri ng masquerpets habang kinukuha mo ang revelation, hindi ba? Sa tingin ko baka…\n

English: ...they are the scouts of the army of Iblis. It looks like we may have to work together for a little while longer. Are you willing to help?
Filipino: ...sila ang mga espiya ng hukbo ni Iblis. Mukhang kailangan pa nating magtulungan ng sandali. Handa ka bang tumulong?\n

English: Excellent. Go in to the temple and gather any information you can about the strange masquerpets.
Filipino: Mahusay. Pumasok ka sa templo at mag-ipon ng anumang impormasyon na makakakuha ka tungkol sa mga kakaibang masquerpets.\n

English: What?! Are you really going to stand by and let the world end?
Filipino: Ano?! Talaga bang titigil ka lang at hahayaang magwakas ang mundo?\n

English: Hmm... Iblis Crasher... So, that is one of the masquerpets? Alright, give me some time to study this information. Thank you.
Filipino: Hmmm... Iblis Crasher... Iyan pala ay isa sa mga masquerpets? Sige, bigyan mo ako ng kaunting panahon para pag-aralan ang impormasyon na ito. Salamat.\n

English: Any information about any Masquerpets is good.
Filipino: Kahit anumang impormasyon tungkol sa mga Masquerpets ay mahalaga.\n

English: Go into the temple and gather any information you can.
Filipino: Pumasok ka sa templo at mag-ipon ng anumang impormasyong makakaya mo.\n

English: Into the Dark
Filipino: Papunta sa Dilim\n

English: Hi. I have studied the information you brought me and I have found that there is an altar in the Iblis Temple. There is also evidence that there are masquerpets guarding the altar.
Filipino: Hi. Inaral ko ang impormasyong dinala mo at natuklasan kong may isang altar sa Iblis Temple. May ebidensya rin na may mga masquerpets na nagbabantay sa altar.\n

English: Do you see? They do not want anyone to interupt the revival of Iblis. We need to do something. We need to stop them!
Filipino: Nakikita mo? Ayaw nila ng sinuman na makagambala sa pagbabangon ni Iblis. Kailangan nating kumilos. Kailangan natin silang pigilin!\n

English: Are you ready for one last journey into the dark?
Filipino: Handa ka na ba para sa huling paglalakbay sa dilim?\n

English: I knew you would be. There is a masquerpet name Iblis Guardian. If you can defeat it, you can enter the altar.
Filipino: Alam kong sasabihin mo 'oo'. May masquerpet na tinatawag na Iblis Guardian. Kung mapapabagsak mo ito, makakapunta ka sa altar.\n

English: Are you serious? What could be more important than saving the world?
Filipino: Seryoso ka ba? Ano pa ang mas mahalaga kaysa iligtas ang mundo?\n

English: Great job, now you can enter the altar. I am counting on you to defeat the followers of Iblis... we all are. Go to the altar now.
Filipino: Magaling na trabaho, ngayon makakapasok ka sa altar. Umaasa ako sa'yo na talunin ang mga tagasunod ni Iblis... tayo lahat. Punta ka na sa altar.\n

English: I do not know exactly where Iblis Guardian is. But we have to find it and destroy it.
Filipino: Hindi ko tiyak kung nasaan ang Iblis Guardian. Pero kailangan natin itong hanapin at sirain.\n

English: Defeat Iblis Guardian and enter the altar.
Filipino: Talunin ang Iblis Guardian at pumasok sa altar.\n

English: If you can defeat the Iblis Guardian you can enter the altar.
Filipino: Kung kaya mong talunin ang Iblis Guardian, makakapasok ka sa altar.\n

English: Dekane Mine
Filipino: Dekane Mine\n

English: Iblis Temple
Filipino: Iblis Temple\n

English: Bloody corridor
Filipino: Madugong Koridor\n

English: Well... Not a bad deal... Can you collect 20 Blood Trillipy Shells and defeat a Mutant Keakoon Worker?
Filipino: Hmm... Hindi masamang kasunduan... Kaya mo bang mag-ipon ng 20 Blood Trillipy Shells at patayin ang isang Mutant Keakoon Worker?\n

English: In that case...Hic, good luck.
Filipino: Kung ganoon... *hic*, sana suwertehin ka.\n

English: Hmm... the Hazardous Blood Trillipys are much stronger...
Filipino: Hmm... mas malakas ang Hazardous Blood Trillipys...\n

English: Thanks to you the extraction in this area will be much easier!
Filipino: Dahil sa'yo mas madali na ang pagkuhang-mina sa lugar na ito!\n

English: Hmm... Despite your level the Hazardous Blood Trillipys are much stronger...
Filipino: Hmm... Kahit sa level mo, mas malakas talaga ang Hazardous Blood Trillipys...\n

English: Collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ loot from the Bloody Trilipy and kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.
Filipino: Mangolekta ng $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ mula sa Bloody Trilipy at patayin ang $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.\n

English: The bottom of the mine
Filipino: Pinakailalim ng mina\n

English: Hello, if you're here it's because you've defeated all the known monsters in the mine. I'm Dekane, the creator of this mine. Now that you've proven yourself, I'll be able to tell you the real problem that lies at the bottom of the mine. In a secret room sleep dragons from ancient times created by Shade ages ago.
Filipino: Hello, kung nandito ka ibig sabihin natalo mo na ang lahat ng kilalang halimaw sa mina. Ako si Dekane, ang gumawa ng minahang ito. Ngayon na napatunayan mo na ang sarili mo, masasabi ko na sa'yo ang totoong problema na nasa kailaliman ng mina. Sa isang lihim na silid natutulog ang mga dragon mula pa sa sinaunang panahon na nilikha ni Shade noon.\n

English: Good luck!
Filipino: Sana suwertehin ka!\n

English: It is true that this is not an easy thing for an adventurer. Come and try your luck again when you are ready.
Filipino: Totoo na hindi ito madaling gawain para sa isang adventurer. Bumalik at subukan muli ang swerte mo kapag handa ka na.\n

English: So you really did kill them all... Thank you very much.
Filipino: Kaya pala talagang pinatay mo silang lahat... Maraming salamat.\n

English: Collect 30 Blood Trillipy Shells from the Bloody Trillipy and kill 3 Mutant Keakoon Workers.
Filipino: Mangolekta ng 30 Blood Trillipy Shells mula sa Bloody Trillipy at pumatay ng 3 Mutant Keakoon Worker.\n

English: To defeat them, you'll need a well-armed team. Ah, but there's one detail I forgot to mention. You'll need 1,000,000 Penya to open the door, but for now, collecting 30 Blood Trillipy Shells and defeating 3 Mutant Keakoon Workers will be enough. Are you ready to accept this challenge?
Filipino: Para talunin sila, kakailanganin mo ng maayos na armadong koponan. Ah, may isang detalye akong nakalimutan banggitin. Kakailanganin mo ng 1,000,000 Penya para mabuksan ang pinto, pero sa ngayon, sapat na ang pagkuha ng 30 Blood Trillipy Shells at pagpatay ng 3 Mutant Keakoon Workers. Handang tanggapin ang hamon na ito?\n
